Race.SpecificTitle: PW School District -- Local Option - Term Limits
Race.FullText:
"LOCAL OPTION ELECTION
Within East Carroll Parish School District:
Shall the number of terms of office that any member of the school board may serve be limited to three consecutive four-year terms?"

Race.SpecificTitle: PW PJ Prop. #1 -- 8.24 Mills (drainage) - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Propositions 
Proposition No. 1
(Tax Continuation)

Summary:  Authority to continue to levy a 10 year, 8.24 mills tax for constructing, maintaining and administering Parish public drainage and canals, ditches and other public drainage facilities.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of East Carroll, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), be authorized to continue to levy an eight and twenty-four hundredths (8.24) mills tax on all property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $303,200 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2013 and ending with the year 2022, for the purpose of constructing, maintaining and administering Parish public drainage and canals, ditches and other public drainage facilities, said millage to represent a one and eighty-seven hundredths mills (1.87) increase over the 6.37 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2012 pursuant to an election held on October 5, 2002?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW PJ Prop. #2 -- 8.24 Mills (bridges) - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Propositions 
Proposition No. 2
(Tax Continuation)

Summary:  Authority to continue to levy a 10 year, 8.24 mills tax for constructing, maintaining and administering Parish roads and bridges.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of East Carroll, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), be authorized to continue to levy an eight and twenty-four hundredths (8.24) mills tax on all property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $303,200 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2013 and ending with the year 2022, for the purpose of constructing, maintaining and administering Parish roads and bridges, said millage to represent a one and eighty-seven hundredths mills (1.87) increase over the 6.37 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2012 pursuant to an election held on October 5, 2002?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Police Jury -- Disabled Veterans Homesteand Exp.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Proposition
(Disabled Veterans Homestead Exemption)

Summary:  Authorizes an additional homestead exemption in the Parish of East Carroll, State of Louisiana, for certain disabled veterans and surviving spouses in accordance with and subject to the provisions of Article VII, Section 21(K) of the Louisiana Constitution.
Race.FullText: Shall an additional homestead exemption be authorized in the Parish of East Carroll, State of Louisiana, for certain disabled veterans and surviving spouses in accordance with and subject to the provisions of Article VII, Section 21(K) of the Louisiana Constitution, provided that this additional homestead exemption shall extend and apply to property in East Carroll Parish only after approval by a majority of the registered voters of East Carroll Parish voting on this proposition?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Hospital Serv. Dist. -- 10.57 Mills - BOC - 5 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Proposition
(Hospital Service District)
(Millage Continuation)

Summary:  5 year, 10.57 mills property tax continuation of East Carroll Parish Hospital Service District for the purpose of the operation and maintenance of the East Carroll Parish Hospital.
Race.FullText: Shall East Carroll Parish Hospital Service District, East Carroll Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to levy a special tax of ten and fifty-seven hundredths (10.57) mills on all property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $396,375 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of five (5) years, beginning with the year 2013 and ending with the year 2017, with the avails or proceeds of said tax to be used exclusively for the operation and maintenance of the East Carroll Parish Hospital, said millage to represent a one and thirty-six hundredths mills (1.36) increase over the 9.21 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2012 pursuant to an election held on October 20, 2007?
